Summary: slow moving very bright light, discharged a smaller light and picked up the speed, changed color to dull orange glow
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside my apartment dorr and looked to the right. I saw a very bright object moving slowly in the sky from South to North. For a second I thought it was a planet or a star. Then I noticed it moving slowly. thnen I thought it might be an airplane or a helicopter with landing lights. I thought it had to be, it was too bright. Then, I noticed there were no strobe lights of any kind. I grabbed my binoculus and focused on it. As I have said, it was a very bright light that discharged an itty-bitty small light from the stern and picked up the speed. It looked like the little light had its own power and accelerated away. It looked like a little white dot. The main object started to pick up speed very fast, changed color to a dull orange glow and disappeared over the trees. The whole thing lasted two minutes.
